attributes.action: order an immediate review of ALL MPs expenses claims made since the facility was installed and any that do not fill the basic minimum requirement of being 'disbursed necessarily and wholly to facilitate (....name of MP...) in the conduct of his/her business in representing the electorate of his constituency' are ordered to be repaid by the claimant immediately - including those who have retired and from the estate of those who have since died.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Honourable members do not need chocolate father christmas's and malteser sweets to facilitate them to carry out their business as elected representatives of the people who live in the constituency which put them into office.  So much of what has been released to date is tantamount to institutionalised theft of taxpayers money and MUST be repaid.  Anywhere else on the planet and the perpetrators of this fraud would be in jail or put against a wall and shot.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
